content: CFS-MSL FGR Floor grid Floor grid frame for high-capacity, fire-rated cable installations through floors ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy-to-install floor grid system with no additional firestopping required Optimized cable density in vertical openings with just a few sleeves Modular design for easy customization – you can combine fire-rated sleeves in different sizes within one frame Four row configurations to choose from with options for purchase kits with- or without fire sleeves Applications For the firestopping cable openings in floors after concrete has been poured Ideal for cable risers going through floors CFS-MSL GCL Clamps are required for ganging ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Storage and transportation temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Temperature resistance range: 14 - 167 °F Technical Data | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 122 °F | Temperature resistance range | 14 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2341231 - Floor grid CFS-MSL FGR 24x4 1 row - Package Size 1 pc - 3805997 - Floor grid 1 row + 4xLarge devices + 1Ganging clamps 12pcs - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL FGR 24x4 Floor grid 1 row - 4x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 12x CFS-MSL GCL (12) Ganging clip - 2341232 - Floor grid CFS-MSL FGR 24x9 2 rows - Package Size 1 pc - 3805998 - Floor grid 2 row + 8xLarge devices + 2Ganging clamps 12pcs - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-MSL FGR 24x9 Floor grid 2 rows - 8x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 24x CFS-MSL GCL (12) Ganging clip - 12x CFS-MSL L 6x4 Firestop sleeve - 36x CFS-MSL GCL (12) Ganging clip - 2341234 - Floor grid CFS-MSL FGR 24x19 4 rows - Package Size 1 pc - 3806000 - Floor grid 4 row + 16xLarge devices + 4Ganging clamps 12pcs -
